profileAlternative.name: Rakeysh Kohli
profileAlternative.headline: Sr. Frontend Web Developer
profileAlternative.summary:
Total 7 years of experience in UI Development & Web Application Development.
Having 1 year work experience in Angular-2/4/6.
Having 2 years of work experience in WordPress theme and customization.
Having 4 years of experience in Web Designing, HTML Development, CSS, CSS3, SASS & JQuery Development.
Worked on Web Responsive Design using Twitter Bootstrap, Materialize CSS & Zurb Foundation Framework. Experience in W3C standards, all Browser Compatibility & Device Compatibility of UI Development.

Hands on work experience in - PSD to Html/css, Wordpress, Angular conversion
